name: Cosmic Coliseum: Prologue
description:
Cosmic Coliseum: Prologue is an Action-shooter Rouguelite where you must fight to survive the first 10 minutes of a 30-minute Galactic Gladiator Tournament.



Choose your champion and then battle to survive wave after wave of gruelling combat as The Overlords send their vicious alien hordes into the arena to destroy you.



Gather XP from your fallen enemies and level-up to gain access to a huge range of upgrades that will unlock advanced weapons and enhanced abilities.



Defeat the Overlord Champions to access special bonus power-ups

- Choose from a range of dynamic Characters, each with a different weapon and a unique secondary skill.

- Collect cash to spend in the Arena Market.

- Destroy each Overlord Boss to unlock the next arena as you grow stronger and more experienced.

- Accumulate meta-currency with each kill and use it to purchase permanent upgrades from the talent tree.

- Combine all of your skills and abilities as you forge a path to victory and become the Ultimate Champion of the Cosmic Coliseum.
